Friday August 05 2022

FRIDAY, AUGUST 5, 2022 – BALTIMORE, OH – BALTIMORE FESTIVAL

Address: BALTIMORE, OH – Johnson Park, 220 Summers Choice Dr. – 43105
Time: 8:00 pm

The British Invasion are heading back to Baltimore, OH, to perform in-concert following the Baltimore Festival Cruise-In Car Show! Join us as the community comes together to celebrate, unwind, and enjoy great food and music. The band will be performing on the Jerry Ayers Stage in Johnson Park. Admission is FREE! Performance Time is: 8:00 PM to 9:30 PM

Saturday August 13 2022

SATURDAY, AUGUST 13, 2022 - MARYSVILLE, OH - ALL OHIO BALLOON FEST

Address: MARYSVILLE, OH - Union County Airport, 15000 Weaver Road - 43040
Time: 4:00 pm

The All Ohio Balloon Fest has been a community staple in Marysville since 1975, and has a family-friendly atmosphere and has something for all ages. Come to the fest to see The British Invasion and see hot air balloons from all over the world! Tickets are required for this event! The British Invasion PERFORMANCE TIME IS: 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM. For Tickets and more information visit: http://www.allohioballoonfest.com/

Time: 7:00 pm

Join us for this celebration of classic automobiles and see hundreds of cars on display in the Metro Center competing for 6-foot tall trophies! Registration or Tickets are required for this event, or pay when you enter. PERFORMANCE TIME IS: 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM

Saturday October 08 2022

British Tour 2022- PLAN NOW FOR OCTOBER 8-16, 2022 !!

Address: Liverpool - London, England !!
Time: 12:00 am

PLAN NOW FOR OCTOBER 8-16, 2022 !! The British Invasion will once again be touring England, and the best part is-- YOU CAN COME WITH US !!! This very special custom tour takes our group to the British heart of Rock & Roll.  This magical, mystical tour will include historic sites of rock royalty in both Liverpool and London, exclusive musical experiences with The British Invasion, and much more.  Don`t just see Liverpool and London.  Be a part of it with The British Invasion!  We`ll experience:  The Casbah Coffee Club, The Cavern Club, Albert Dock, Mathew Street, Penny Lane, Strawberry Fields, Apple Building, Abbey Road, Mendips, Kensington Gardens, The Original Hard Rock Cafe, King`s Row, BBC Studios, and much, much, more! View our England Tour 2018 Promo Video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6iv4R5E-9Q0  

For More information visit Click here

Sunday October 09 2022

SUNDAY, OCTOBER 9, 2022 - LIVERPOOL, ENGLAND - THE CASBAH

Address: Liverpool, England - 8 Haymans Green West Derby Village Liverpool L12 7JG
Time: 12:00 am

The Casbah Coffee Club brought about many pivotal moments in the early days of The Beatles, shaping their beginnings and providing a home for their distinctive Merseybeat sound, which would change the face of popular music forever. The Casbah knew the savage young Beatles before their fame; their first live performances were here, in the club they made their own, even being involved in decorating the basement in its distinctive style. Other artists that have played The Casbah include Cilla Black, Rory Storm and The Hurricanes, The Searchers, Gerry & The Pacemakers, and The Black Jacks. The British Invasion will be giving a special performance here for our V.I.P. touring group, following a guided tour of The Casbah by the brother of Beatle Pete Best !! The British Invasion is extremely proud and pleased to be once again performing at this historic venue! Check our website for details on how you can travel with the band as part of our V.I.P. touring party and join us for this momentous occasion. PERFORMANCE TIME IS: TBD

For More information visit Click here

Monday October 10 2022

MONDAY, OCTOBER 10, 2022 - LIVERPOOL, ENGLAND - THE CAVERN CLUB

Address: Liverpool, England - 10 Mathew St., Liverpool L2 6RE
Time: 7:30 pm

The world-famous Cavern Club is a must-see for music fans visiting Liverpool. The Cavern Club first opened as a jazz club in 1957 and has played an important role in British music ever since, including the era of The Beatles when they performed there almost 300 times in the early 1960s. Other artists that have played at The Cavern include The Rolling Stones, The Who, The Yardbirds, The Hollies, Elton John, Queen, and John Lee Hooker. The British Invasion is extremely proud and pleased to be returning to once again perform at this historic venue! Check our website for details on how you can travel with the band as part of our V.I.P. touring party and join us for this momentous occasion. PERFORMANCE TIME IS: 7:30 PM Local England Time

For More information visit Click here

Thursday October 13 2022

THURSDAY, OCTOBER 13, 2022 - LONDON, ENGLAND - THE HALF MOON, PUTNEY

Address: London, England - 93 Lower Richmond Rd, London SW15 1EU, UK
Time: 12:00 am

The Half Moon in Putney, London, is one of the longest running and most respected live music venues. The venue has hosted live music every night since 1963. Some of the biggest names in popular music have played at the Half Moon, including The Rolling Stones, The Who, The Small Faces, The Rutles, John Mayall's Bluesbreakers, Alexis Korner, The Yardbirds, Van Morrison, The Bonzo Dog Doo Dah Band, The Pretty Things, The Nashville Teens, Elvis Costello, Steve Marriott, Nick Cave, Bo Diddley, U2, and even Kate Bush's first public performance was here! The British Invasion is extremely proud and pleased to be returning to once again perform at this historic venue! Check our website for details on how you can travel with the band as part of our V.I.P. touring party and join us for this momentous occasion. PERFORMANCE TIME IS: 8:00 PM Local London Time

For More information visit Click here

Saturday August 26 2023

SATURDAY, AUGUST 26, 2023 - WOOSTER, OH - THE BLUE BARN WINERY

Address: WOOSTER, OH - 4407 Columbus Rd. - 44691
Time: 6:00 pm

THE BRITISH INVASION will be appearing in-concert at the BLUE BARN WINERY, 4407 Columbus Rd., Wooster, OH 44691 Bring your own picnic food or purchase a great Boar’s Head cheese and meat plate. Music is generally outside (weather permitting) under the stars or tent, whichever you prefer. Acres of beautiful seating. Guests can bring food, blankets, picnic baskets, and lawn chairs for the concert. PERFORMANCE TIME: 6:00 PM TO 9:00 PM. There is $10 COVER CHARGE for this event, but the cover charge also includes your choice of beverage: 1 glass of wine, 1 beer, or 2 sodas.
